verses.verse: And <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> another <WG243> strong <WG2478> angel <WG32> coming down <WG2597> out <WG1537> of heaven <WG3772>, arrayed <WG4016> with a cloud <WG3507>; and <WG2532> the rainbow <WG2463> was upon <WG1909> his <WG846> head <WG2776>, and <WG2532> his <WG846> face <WG4383> was as <WG5613> the sun <WG2246>, and <WG2532> his <WG846> feet <WG4228> as <WG5613> pillars <WG4769> of fire <WG4442>;

and <WG2532> he had <WG2192> in <WG1722> his <WG846> hand <WG5495> a little book <WG974> open <WG455>: and <WG2532> he set <WG5087> his <WG846> right <WG1188> foot <WG4228> upon <WG1909> the sea <WG2281>, and <WG1161> his left <WG2176> upon <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>;

and <WG2532> he cried <WG2896> with a great <WG3173> voice <WG5456>, as <WG5618> a lion <WG3023> roareth <WG3455>: and <WG2532> when <WG3753> he cried <WG2896>, the seven <WG2033> thunders <WG1027> uttered <WG2980> their <WG1438> voices <WG5456>.

And <WG2532> when <WG3753> the seven <WG2033> thunders <WG1027> uttered <WG2980> their <WG1438> voices <WG5456>, I was about <WG3195> to write <WG1125>: and <WG2532> I heard <WG191> a voice <WG5456> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> saying <WG3004>, <WG3427> Seal up <WG4972> the things which <WG3739> the seven <WG2033> thunders <WG1027> uttered <WG2980>, and <WG2532> write <WG1125> them <WG5023> not <WG3361>.

And <WG2532> the angel <WG32> that <WG3739> I saw <WG1492> standing <WG2476> upon <WG1909> the sea <WG2281> and <WG2532> upon <WG1909> the earth <WG1093> lifted up <WG142> his <WG846> right hand <WG5495> to <WG1519> heaven <WG3772>,

and <WG2532> sware <WG3660> by <WG1722> him that liveth <WG2198> for <WG1519> ever <WG165> and ever <WG165>, who <WG3739> created <WG2936> the heaven <WG3772> and <WG2532> the things that are <WG846> therein <WG1722>, and <WG2532> the earth <WG1093> and <WG2532> the things that are <WG846> therein <WG1722>, and <WG2532> the sea <WG2281> and <WG2532> the things that are <WG846> therein <WG1722>, that <WG3754> there shall be <WG2071> delay <WG5550> no <WG3756> longer <WG2089>:

but <WG235> in <WG1722> the days <WG2250> of the voice <WG5456> of the seventh <WG1442> angel <WG32>, when <WG3752> he is about <WG3195> to sound <WG4537>, then <WG2532> is finished <WG5055> the mystery <WG3466> of God <WG2316>, according <WG5613> to the good tidings which he declared <WG2097> to his <WG1438> servants <WG1401> the prophets <WG4396>.

And <WG2532> the voice <WG5456> which <WG3739> I heard <WG191> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772>, I heard it again <WG3825> speaking <WG2980> with <WG3326> me <WG1700>, and <WG2532> saying <WG3004>, Go <WG5217>, take <WG2983> the book <WG974> which <WG3588> is open <WG455> in <WG1722> the hand <WG5495> of the angel <WG32> that <WG3588> standeth <WG2476> upon <WG1909> the sea <WG2281> and <WG2532> upon <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>.

And <WG2532> I went <WG565> unto <WG4314> the angel <WG32>, saying <WG3004> unto him <WG846> that he should give <WG1325> me <WG3427> the little book <WG974>. And <WG2532> he saith <WG3004> unto me <WG3427>, Take <WG2983> it <WG2532>, and eat <WG2719> it <WG846> up <WG2719>; and <WG2532> it shall make <WG4087> thy <WG4675> belly <WG2836> bitter <WG4087>, but <WG235> in <WG1722> thy <WG4675> mouth <WG4750> it shall be <WG2071> sweet <WG1099> as <WG5613> honey <WG3192>.

And <WG2532> I took <WG2983> the little book <WG974> out <WG1537> of the angel <WG32>'s hand <WG5495>, and <WG2532> ate <WG2719> it <WG846> up <WG2719>; and <WG2532> it was <WG2258> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> mouth <WG4750> sweet <WG1099> as <WG5613> honey <WG3192>: and <WG2532> when <WG3753> I had eaten <WG5315> it <WG846>, my <WG3450> belly <WG2836> was made bitter <WG4087>.

And <WG2532> they say <WG3004> unto me <WG3427>, Thou <WG4571> must <WG1163> prophesy <WG4395> again <WG3825> over <WG1909> many <WG4183> peoples <WG2992> and <WG2532> nations <WG1484> and <WG2532> tongues <WG1100> and <WG2532> kings <WG935>.
